import React, { useState, useEffect, FC } from 'react' import '../styles/FeaturedProducts.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCartPlus } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' interface FeaturedProductsProps { allProducts: any, } const FeaturedProducts: React.FC = ({ allProducts }) => { const [featuredProducts, setFeaturedProducts] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { allProducts.sort((a:any, b:any) => a.rating - b.rating) },[]) return (
) } export default FeaturedProducts
